code: import{useRef,useEffect}from'react';export var defaultProps={percent:0,prefixCls:'rc-progress',strokeColor:'#2db7f5',strokeLinecap:'round',strokeWidth:1,trailColor:'#D9D9D9',trailWidth:1,gapPosition:'bottom'};export var useTransitionDuration=function useTransitionDuration(){var pathsRef=useRef([]);var prevTimeStamp=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){var now=Date.now();var updated=false;pathsRef.current.forEach(function(path){if(!path){return;}updated=true;var pathStyle=path.style;pathStyle.transitionDuration='.3s, .3s, .3s, .06s';if(prevTimeStamp.current&&now-prevTimeStamp.current<100){pathStyle.transitionDuration='0s, 0s';}});if(updated){prevTimeStamp.current=Date.now();}});return pathsRef.current;};
